A1: President Koroma for choosing Congo as the country to host
RelatedSentence: Second shows the ten member countries Presidents and / or their Foreign Ministers plus the AU Commissioner are now well seated and President Sassou Nguesso has profusely thanked President Koroma for choosing Congo as the country to host this important Summit summoned by President Koroma .
